name: 'Home Improvement' -The TV Show Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who of the following is NOT one of the Taylor children?
Is Wilson the neighbor's first or last name?
questions.correct: Both his first and last name
questions.explanation:
Both his first and last name.

	His name is Wilson Wilson according to IMBD.com.

questions.text: Who played Lisa, the 'Tool Time' girl?

questions.explanation:
Polly Holliday.

	Polly Holliday also played Florence Jean Castleberry on the TV show 'Alice'.

questions.text: What is one type of race that Tim Taylor challenged Bob Villa to?
There was an episode in which Al's mother died.
questions.explanation:
True.

	She died after Al told her he was getting married.

questions.text: What did Tim Taylor glue to his forehead?
What was the name of Tim's favorite store?
What state did the Taylors live in?
questions.explanation:
Michigan.

	They lived in a suburb of Detroit.
